infoList.title: Mall Hours
infoList.subtitle: See upcoming holiday hours, special hours, etc.

infoList.title: Guest Service
infoList.subtitle: Get in touch with our friendly guest service staff
infoList.details: Need a hand? Our friendly guest service staff is located between Entry 4 & 5. Available services are listed below.

additionalInfo.title: Wheelchairs & Motorized Scooters
additionalInfo.details: Complimentary wheelchairs and motorized scooters are available on a first-come, first-served basis. Photo Identification and valid credit card are required. Please note that scooters with a battery life of two green bars or less will not be rented out within two hours of the mall closing.

additionalInfo.title: Lost & Found
additionalInfo.details:
Lost or found an item during your visit? Be sure to contact our Security Control Centre at (905) 879-2111.

Found items are transferred to the Security Office where they are kept for a minimum period of 30 days.

additionalInfo.title: First Aid
additionalInfo.details: A first aid kit is available at the kiosk for our guests.

additionalInfo.title: TTY Telephone
additionalInfo.details: A TTY unit is available for our guests with impaired hearing.

infoList.title: Amenities
infoList.subtitle: Find the Washrooms, lockers, 24-hour security, ATM and other amenities
infoList.details: Looking for something else not listed? Vaughan Mills offers various amenities and complimentary services. View them on the interactive mall map. Guest Service Washrooms Lockers ATM Public telephones Shopping Shuttle Other Available Services: 24-hour security Wi-Fi Family conveniences Universal washrooms + nursing lounges Stroller rentals Family parking Emergency diaper change kits For more information please visit the website: https://www.vaughanmills.com/info/centre-amenities/

infoList.title: Gift Card Balance
infoList.subtitle: Check your Vaughan Mills Gift Card balance
infoList.details: The Vaughan Mills Gift Card is accepted at our 250 fashion, outlet, dining, and entertainment options. Available at our Guest Services kiosk located between Entry 4 & 5.

additionalInfo.title: Check your gift card balance
additionalInfo.details: Already have a gift card? Tap on the "Check your balance" button above to check your balance online.

additionalInfo.title: Where to buy a gift card?
additionalInfo.details: Come visit us at the Guest Service kiosk to get yours today!

additionalInfo.title: Who accepts the gift card?
additionalInfo.details: The Vaughan Mills gift card is accepted by all retailers with the exception of those listed on the non-participating merchant list found here.

additionalInfo.title: Further notice
additionalInfo.details: Please note that purchases $1,000 and over must be approved by Management and all purchases $5,000 and over can only be made Monday to Friday from 9 AM - 5 PM.

infoList.title: Vaughan Mills Social Network
infoList.subtitle: Get social with Vaughan Mills
infoList.details: Follow Vaughan Mills on all the following social networks!

infoList.title: Public Transportation
infoList.subtitle: See public transportation information and schedules
infoList.details: View TTC Schedule: https://www.ttc.ca/Routes/index.jsp View YRT Schedule: http://www.yrt.ca/en/schedulesmaps/schedulesmaps.asp

additionalInfo.title: From Toronto
additionalInfo.details:
Take TTC Line 1 to Yorkdale Station. At the bus stop on Yorkdale Rd., near the Holt Renfrew entrance, board YRT Route 360 - Vaughan Express* to Vaughan Mills.

(*NOTE: This service is only available during rush hour on weekdays.)

additionalInfo.title: From Finch Station
additionalInfo.details: Take VIVA Blue NORTH and get off at Yonge and 16th-Carrville Road. From here, transfer to YRT Route 85 or 85C WEST to Vaughan Mills terminal.

additionalInfo.title: From Downsview Station
additionalInfo.details: (NOTE: An extra fare is required to travel north of Steeles Ave.) Take TTC Route 105 or 105B NORTH to the Rutherford GO Station. From here, transfer to YRT Route 85, 85C, or 87 WEST to Vaughan Mills terminal. Alternate route (Weekdays only): Take TTC Route 107B North to the Rutherford GO Station. From the GO Station take YRT Route 85, 85C or 87 WEST to Vaughan Mills terminal. For additional information on the TTC or YRT/Viva, including routes, fares and schedules, please visit: www.ttc.ca or www.yorkregiontransit.com.

additionalInfo.title: Vaughan Mills YRT Transit Terminal connects to:
additionalInfo.details:
Platform 1: 26 Maple Local
Platform 2: 12 Pine Valley and 87 Autumn Hill
Platform 3: 85 Rutherford - Westbound
Platform 4: 20/20A Jane - Southbound
Platform 5: 21 Vellore Local, 760 Vaughan Mills/Wonderland (Seasonal Service)
Platform 6: 20/20A Jane - Northbound
Platform 7: 85/85C Rutherford - Eastbound
Platform 8: 4 Major Mackenzie, 360 Vaughan Express

Need help planning your route? Visit the YRT Trip Planner.

infoList.title: Shopping Shuttle
infoList.subtitle: Our seasonal shuttle provides free roundtrip transportation from Toronto
infoList.details: IMPORTANT: The Shopping Shuttle operates between June 1 to September 30 and returns November 25 - December 26 for convenient Holiday shopping! The Shopping Shuttle provides free seasonal round-trip transportation from Toronto's Union Station to Vaughan Mills twice a day. Please remember that you must depart from Vaughan Mills for your return trip back to Union Station based on the service schedule. To register for the Vaughan Mills Shopping Shuttle, simply locate the City Tours Attractions Representatives at Union Station. Identification bracelets to ride the shuttle are distributed on a day-of, first-come, first-served basis. Please arrive well before the scheduled departure time to avoid disappointment. Shuttle boards on Front Street, between York St and Simcoe St, and drops off near Entry 6 upon arrival at Vaughan Mills.

additionalInfo.title: Morning Service
additionalInfo.details: Departs Union Station at 10 AM and returns from Vaughan Mills at 3 PM.

additionalInfo.title: Afternoon Service
additionalInfo.details: Departs Union Station at 1 PM and returns from Vaughan Mills at 6 PM.

infoList.subtitle: Discover a place where fashion, outlets, dining and entertainment meet
infoList.title: Tourist Information
infoList.details: We're please to offer you the following tourism programs: Hotel Packages https://www.vaughanmills.com/tourism/hotel-packages/ Group Tours https://www.vaughanmills.com/tourism/group-visits/ Gift with Purchase Program https://www.vaughanmills.com/tourism/tourism-incentives/ First Class Savings Booklet https://www.vaughanmills.com/tourism/tourism-incentives/ Vaughan Mill Shopping Shuttle https://www.vaughanmills.com/tourism/shopping-shuttle/ For more information on any of our tourism programs, contact tourism@vaughanmills.com.

infoList.title: Accessibility
infoList.subtitle: Vaughan Mills is committed to excellence in serving all customers
infoList.details:
Vaughan Mills is committed to excellence in serving all customers and is an easily-accessible, one level shopping centre with:

A Simple-to-Navigate Racetrack Design
Automatic Sliding Doors
Easily Accessible Washrooms
76 Prime Designated Accessible Parking Spaces
Complimentary Wheelchairs and Scooters
A Telecommunication Teletypewriter (TTY) (available at the Guest Services kiosk)

Complimentary wheelchairs and motorized scooters are available on a first-come, first-served basis. Photo Identification and valid credit card are required. Please note that scooters with a battery life of two green bars or less will not be rented out within two hours of the mall closing.

infoList.title: About Vaughan Mills
infoList.subtitle: Learn more at Vaughan Mills
infoList.details:
Welcome to a place where fashion, plus outlets, dining and entertainment equals a destination you have to experience to believe. One of the most unique collections found anywhere in Canada presents an unrivalled luxury outlet shopping experience for savvy shoppers from all over the globe.

The world's leading fashion and lifestyle brands await you including: Saks Fifth Avenue OFF Fifth, hr2 Holt Renfrew, Calvin Klein Outlet, Victoria's Secret, Victoria's Secret PINK, A|X Armani Exchange Outlet, Hugo Boss Factory Store, Banana Republic Factory Store, Michael Kors Outlet, The Outlet by Harry Rosen, TUMI, Brooks Brothers, MAC Cosmetics, Cole Haan, Vince Camuto, Tommy Hilfiger Outlet and so many more.

Vaughan Mills also includes world-class entertainment attractions, such as Pro Hockey Life, Bass Pro Shops Outdoor World and LEGOLAND Discovery Centre. Coming soon Sephora.

locations.name: 1 Bass Pro Mills Dr, Vaughan, Ontario
